moves.1. d4: Welcome to the game . I am white and karolistas is black. This was first really game  I have gained confidence in skills and  grew as a player.
moves.4... Bg4: black advancing really early in the game.
moves.5. h3: Took a move to stop black in its tracks .
moves.6... Qd6: getting ready to castle king side.
moves.7. Bg2: getting ready to castle king side.
moves.9. gxh5: fell for the trap . I should of let black take my pawn and then I would take the black pawn .
moves.9... Nxh5: takes pawn Learned from  my mistake.
moves.12. e4: moves pawn up to put pressure on black.
moves.16. Qxe2: takes piece to  get out of check.
moves.17... Qf6: makes black go back to save its most powerful piece.
moves.21. b4: moves up to try to take the pawn.
moves.22... Rda8: blocks my way to trade in for a power player.
